net.coderodde.multilog.model

Class Post

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.coderodde.multilog.model.Post

  • public class Post
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all information of a forum post.

      • getHtml

        public final java.lang.String getHtml()
        Runs the markup algorithm and returns everything as HTML. Runs in linear time and operates on operator stack, which makes it possible to fix (?) invalid markup as to output valid HTML.
        Returns:
        the HTML fragment for this post.

      • isTimestampsDifferent

        public boolean isTimestampsDifferent()
        Returns true if the time stamps of this post are different. false otherwise.
        Returns:
        see above.

        Returns:

        public boolean isEdible()
